name: The Masks of Were
description:
This game was developed for the 1-month Game Jam,  "Metroidvania Month 18."

Can you navigate the secrets of the hidden tomb, defeat the tomb boss, and escape? The Masks of Were features 3 different enemy types, multiple hazards, a final boss, and power-ups to escape the treacherous tomb.

Total playtime = 15-20 minutes.

Thank you so much for your interest in this game!
